title: Digital weather station
summary: A station that records weather information.

description.descriptionText01: A system/station that has the minimum functionality to record:
description.descriptionText02: Nullam at risus et justo porttitor vehicula. Pellentesque congue laoreet lorem vitae malesuada. Nullam interdum ante vel risus blandit laoreet. Aliquam eget rhoncus libero, ut lacinia felis.

eligibility.eligibiltyBullet01: Must be able to link wirelessly to a computer.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet02: The cost includes the station, mounting facilities and sensors for above functionality and excludes installation costs, service costs, annual licence fee for software and calibration.
